definitions.definition: A writing board finished with a hard white material, which can be written upon using special non-permanent markers and subsequently wiped clean.
A collaborative tool allowing several users to write and draw on the same shared display.

main_definition: A writing board finished with a hard white material, which can be written upon using special non-permanent markers and subsequently wiped clean.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , computing ) A collaborative tool allowing several users to write and draw on the same shared display.
